text: Kakyerε εserε so Arabfoͻ a wͻ’kaa akyire no sε: “Yεbεfrε mo ama moako atia amanfoͻ bi a wͻn ho yε den yie wͻ akoo-die mu, akosi sε wͻ’bεbrε wͻn ho aseε. Afei sε moyε sotie a Onyankopͻn bεma mo akatua pa paa; na sε modane moakyi dema, sεdeε modii kan danee moakyi maeε no a, Ɔde asotwee a εyε ya paa bεtwe moaso “
